caption.p: Principal Component Analysis of the cytotoxic effect of Pistacia essential oils on LoVo cells. ( A) PCA biplot with PC1 and PC2 distribution of essential oil samples and chemical components of the phytocomplexes. ( B) PCA biplot with PC3 and PC4 distribution of essential oil samples and chemical components of the phytocomplexes. Clusters of cooperating compounds with a positive correlation to one or two components are identified with circles (green for P. lentiscus, yellow for P. integerrima, and blue for P. terebinthus).
